Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

below image in black: Velasco Pinxit   Ale'r Bannerman Sculpsit / THE DEATH OF SAINT JOSEPH / From the Original Picture Painted by Velasco in the Collection of the Rt. Hon'ble the Earl of Orford at Houghton / Vol II No. 13  Size of the picture 3F3 by 4F10 in length John Boydell excudit 1766 | on sheet in pencil: 2-526
life_date: After Diego Rodriguez Velazquez, Painter, Spanish, 1599–1660; Alexander Bannerman, Engraver, English, 1730–1782; John Boydell, Publisher, British, 1719–1804
title: The Death of Saint Joseph
